article.simpara: This document describes the tailored Cleanroom process to develop the Co-dfns compiler. The current limited manpower for the project drives most of these adaptations. This scales down a number of processes since other processes exist in their place and do not contribute to the primary development team.

The descriptions, enumerations, and organization of these processes is taken directly from The Cleanroom Reference Model as found in Cleanroom Software Engineering by Prowell, et al. but have been adapted to fit this project. Since not everyone is expected to have a copy of this book, this guide attempts to explicate as far as possible the specific process details for successful execution, but it does not attempt to replace the above reference for an understanding of Cleanroom Software Engineering in general.
